price: Sai suka sõke rãƙumar, kuma suka kangare daga barin umurnin Ubangijinsu, kuma suka ce: "Yã Sãlihu! Ka zõ mana da abin da kake yi mana wa'adi da shi, idan kã kasance daga manzanni!"
arabic: فَعَقَرُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةَ وَعَتَوۡاْ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَقَالُواْ يَٰصَٰلِحُ ٱئۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
